abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel announces proposal for new oversight agency, Civilian Office of Police Accountability, which will investigate serious misconduct and police shootings; makes no mention on how its leadership will be chosen or other recommendations assuring its funding, independence and impartiality; critics hope plan will be amended with suggested safeguards before upcoming City Council vote.

headline.print_headline: Chicago Mayor’s Plan to Toughen Oversight of the Police Is Under Fire
headline.main: Chicago’s Plan to Toughen Oversight of Police Is Under Fire

snippet: Some activists say that Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s plan lacks teeth and that more must be done to guarantee that two new oversight agencies are given enough money and influence....
lead_paragraph: Some activists say that Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s plan lacks teeth and that more must be done to guarantee that two new oversight agencies are given enough money and influence.
